channel.title: Reality News Network
channel.description: Reality News covers top stories, both national and international. Also, explore the dark side of the sunshine state. Many RNN News episodes explore the search for lost democracy in Northwest Florida. Suspicious jail torture/killings are frequent here and often the theme of the newscast. Follow this series in it's entirety by visiting the RNN NEWS library at Reality News Network. www.realitynews.net.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Top News Stories! Leave your comments at: 206-350-7055
channel.itunes:author: David Craig
channel.itunes:summary: Reality News covers top stories, both national and international. Also, explore the dark side of the sunshine state. Many RNN News episodes explore the search for lost democracy in Northwest Florida. Suspicious jail torture/killings are frequent here and often the theme of the newscast. Follow this series in it's entirety by visiting the RNN NEWS library at Reality News Network. www.realitynews.net.

item.title: RNN NEWS
item.description: Bad boys. Escambia County as Stephen King imagined it.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Bad boys. Escambia County as Stephen King imagined it.

item.title: RNN NEWS
item.description: Sheriff McNesby shows his appreciation for campaign contributors with a shower of questionable cash. We travel to the fair and learn about a bad guy with a badge in this snapshot of Escambia County, Florida. As Stephen King imagined it.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Sheriff McNesby shows his appreciation for campaign contributors with a shower of questionable cash. We travel to the fair and learn about a bad guy with a badge in this snapshot of Escambia County, Florida. As Stephen King imagined it.

item.title: Drinking, then fighting with the police and more.
item.description: There they go again.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: There they go again.

item.title: Blue Lights
item.description: Don't forget to pay. if you do, don't make the retailer mad at you.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Don't forget to pay. if you do, don't make the retailer mad at you.

item.title: Blue Lights
item.description: Don't do this when you are stopped by the police in a stolen car.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Don't do this when you are stopped by the police in a stolen car.

item.title: Mardi Gras Murder Protest
item.description: The witnesses keep on coming forward. The evidence is mounting. The authorities are doing little or nothing. See the protest at Navarre Beach. Hear from those impacted most by this unsolved murder.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: The witnesses keep on coming forward. The evidence is mounting. The authorities are doing little or nothing. See the protest at Navarre Beach. Hear from those impacted most by this unsolved murder.

item.title: RNN NEWS UPDATE
item.description: The Sheriff will go on trial and other updates.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: The Sheriff will go on trial and other updates.

item.title: Tarnished Justice
item.description: Crime Scene crimes alleged at the Escambia County Sheriff's Office.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Crime Scene crimes alleged at the Escambia County Sheriff's Office.

item.title: Windows Vista Upgrade
item.description: David and his special guest "Resident Myth" from Oregon explore the peaks and valleys of windows Vista. Plus a wide ranging update on the Pensacola scene.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: David and his special guest "Resident Myth" from Oregon explore the peaks and valleys of windows Vista. Plus a wide ranging update on the Pensacola scene.

item.title: MLK Day 2007 * Glyinis Bethel vs Ron McNesby et al
item.description: This RNN NEWS interview features religious protester Glynis Bethel who has been recently imprisoned in Jackson, Mississippi. Then Escambia County, Florida where she and her husband face up to 30 years imprisonment.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: This RNN NEWS interview features religious protester Glynis Bethel who has been recently imprisoned in Jackson, Mississippi. Then Escambia County, Florida where she and her husband face up to 30 years imprisonment.

item.title: TechNet-3
item.description: Host David Craig describes his strange vision of technical advancements in the future.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Host David Craig describes his strange vision of technical advancements in the future.

item.title: Worldwatch 3 - RNN NEWS
item.description: Man sets himself on fire when confronted by deputies. Sheriff about to face the music in Wisconsin hunting sting. Other news of international interest also featured in this Reality News Network Production.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Man sets himself on fire when confronted by deputies. Sheriff about to face the music in Wisconsin hunting sting. Other news of international interest also featured in this Reality News Network Production.

item.title: Technet
item.description: This tech show starts out in a wild party in Ireland and ends up with the next Rupert Murdoch in Australia. Happy 2007 from Reality News Network!
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: This tech show starts out in a wild party in Ireland and ends up with the next Rupert Murdoch in Australia. Happy 2007 from Reality News Network!

item.title: TechNet FAQs
item.description: Another Talkshoe podcast. This time we feature Orien of the crankyfanatic.com website. He is a LOST junkie and our converstation covers alot of ground. Come on in and get lost!
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Another Talkshoe podcast. This time we feature Orien of the crankyfanatic.com website. He is a LOST junkie and our converstation covers alot of ground. Come on in and get lost!

item.title: Worldcast
item.description: RNN News does LIVE interviews with random persons on current matters in the news. See how a college student in Tempe feels about the universe as you know it. Recorded LIVE on Talkshoe.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: RNN News does LIVE interviews with random persons on current matters in the news. See how a college student in Tempe feels about the universe as you know it. Recorded LIVE on Talkshoe.

item.title: Arrested Development - David Morgan on McNesby's felonies arrest
item.description: David Morgan, candidate for Escambia County, Florida Sheriff shares insights with RNN NEWS reporter David Craig in this on the street interview from downtown Pensacola. Hear about the Sheriff's arrest on felony charges only on RNN NEWS.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: David Morgan, candidate for Escambia County, Florida Sheriff shares insights with RNN NEWS reporter David Craig in this on the street interview from downtown Pensacola. Hear about the Sheriff's arrest on felony charges only on RNN NEWS.

item.title: Motion Denied! Sheriff McNesby still facing the music.
item.description: RNN NEWS Update on Sheriff McNesby as he continues to drag out the criminal charges he faces in Wisconsin. Also an interview with candidate for Sheriff, David Morgan.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: RNN NEWS Update on Sheriff McNesby as he continues to drag out the criminal charges he faces in Wisconsin. Also an interview with candidate for Sheriff, David Morgan.

item.title: Tales from the Locked Up Side - Part 2
item.description: Find out why the tank is one of the cooler places at the Escambia County Jail. Got AIDS? You may not like the treatment at the ECSO jail. Rhonda Lumley returns with more tales of torment seen inside the jail.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Find out why the tank is one of the cooler places at the Escambia County Jail. Got AIDS? You may not like the treatment at the ECSO jail. Rhonda Lumley returns with more tales of torment seen inside the jail.

item.title: Paris comes to Pensacola. Taser Death Capitol of the Universe.
item.description: French Director Steve Baumann (Canal Plus / Paris)is in Pensacola working on a documentary about the consequences of taser usage. RNN NEWS found him at an anti taser rally with Leroy Boyd today on Palafox Place and he gave this interview to David Craig. You’ll never guess who wouldn’t talk with him.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: French Director Steve Baumann (Canal Plus / Paris)is in Pensacola working on a documentary about the consequences of taser usage. RNN NEWS found him at an anti taser rally with Leroy Boyd today on Palafox Place and he gave this interview to David Craig. You’ll never guess who wouldn’t talk with him.

item.title: Sexcapades eposed - jailbait at the ECSO jail
item.description: Arrive on vaction and die in incarceration. An update on the past 4 jail deaths in Pensacola, Florida. Plus see how the ECSO makes sexual torture look like child's play. Rhonda Lumley peels back the lid on another jail outrage.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: Arrive on vaction and die in incarceration. An update on the past 4 jail deaths in Pensacola, Florida. Plus see how the ECSO makes sexual torture look like child's play. Rhonda Lumley peels back the lid on another jail outrage.

item.title: Police brutality victim speaks from his home in Texas
item.description: This is our third episode dealing with Matthew William's injuries sustained at Bamboo Willie's on Pensacola Beach in 2001. The Sheriff's Office attempt to coverup this event is brought to light in this conversation with the victim.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
item.itunes:summary: This is our third episode dealing with Matthew William's injuries sustained at Bamboo Willie's on Pensacola Beach in 2001. The Sheriff's Office attempt to coverup this event is brought to light in this conversation with the victim.

item.title: RNN NEWS Update
item.description: What's news in Escambia County? Find out in this RNN NEWS Update. Hosted by David Craig.
item.dc:creator: David Craig
